thread.title: Vicki Gunvalson's 'RHOC' Finale Rant Is Her Nuttiest Yet
thread.title_full: Vicki Gunvalson's 'RHOC' Finale Rant Is Her Nuttiest Yet

title: Vicki Gunvalson's 'RHOC' Finale Rant Is Her Nuttiest Yet
text:
0 
Just when you thought Vicki Gunvalson couldn't possibly offend anyone else on this season of Real Housewives of Orange County she let loose with one of her most nonsensical rants yet. 
At Tamra Judge's baptism (no, we never thought we'd put those words together, either), Vicki compared herself to Jesus on the cross in front of Pastor Mike, who clearly had no idea what he was getting himself into when he agreed to perform this religious act. She then proceeded to throw her daughter under the bus when Tamra mentioned that Breanna said Brooks never actually had pancreatic cancer, calling her a pot stirrer. 
More from The Stir : Vicki Gunvalson's 'Detox' Retreat Seems Like an Escape From Her RHOC Drama 
Her story continues to be so convoluted and crazy pants that it's impossible to take anything she says seriously. But after the finale aired aa visibly upset Vicki appeared on Watch What Happens Live!, and despite being broken up with Brooks, still wasn't willing to reveal anything about the status of his cancer. Oh, and she still referred to him as being sick. 
If we don't get some answers during part one of the RHOC reunion next week, we might combust. There needs to be some honest closure to this entire season. 
Image via Vivian Zink/Bravo
